tgt_original: prāgudaṅmukhasaṃsthaistaiḥ khādayitvaiva prakṣipet |  gocarmamātrabhū lipte siddhiṃ śāntyādikāṃ diśet ||201 ||
tatsarvaṃ hi kṣayaṃ yāti dṛṣṭvā maṇḍalamīdṛśam ||205 ||
kimutānantayaśasāṃ mantracaryānaye sthitaḥ |  padaṃ hyanuttaraṃ yāti japanvai mantra(ntraṃ) tāyinām ||206 ||
tricalupānamantraḥ-om hrīḥ viśuddhadharma sarvapāpāni cāsya śodhaya sarvavikalpānapanaya hū |
ucchinnā durgati steṣāṃ sarvaduḥkhasya sambhavā |  yeṣāṃ caryāvare hyasminmatiratyantanirmalā ||207 ||
yena yūyaṃ jinaiḥ sarvaiḥ saputrairiha śāsane ||208 ||
sarvajñānāṃ kadā loke sambhavo jāyate na vā |  udumbarasyai(sye)
pure śiṣyapraveśārthaṃ tattvaṃ satyaṃ ca śrāvayet ||281 ||
tena satyena me nātha kāmāṃstvaṃ paripūraya ||288 ||
tattvena siddha me bhagavan mahārāgo mahārata ||284 ||
